attributes.action: GIVE HARSHER SENTENCES FOR AFFENDERS CONVICTED OF DEATH BY DRUNK OR DANGEROUS DRIVING
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To give a life time ban from driving.

We would welcome a change in the law to zero tolerence to alcohol when driving.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
